title: Rewriting into Standard Form
text: Rewriting into standard form, the stretch factor will be the same as the a in the original quadratic. First, find the horizontal coordinate of the vertex. Then find the vertical coordinate of the vertex. Substitute the values into standard form, using the "a" from the general form. $$f(x)={ax}^2+bx+c$$ with numerical values of a, $$b$$, and c, what is f?
